GasCloudInitialVelocity.Description: Initial velocity of gas cloud cluster components

GasCloudGravityScale.Description: Gravity scale on gas cloud cluster components

GasCloudBounciness.Description: Bounciness of gas cloud cluster components

GasCloudFriction.Description: Friction of gas cloud cluster components

GasCloudDuration.Description: How long a gas cloud persists (unless it is dissipated by a survivor moving through it)

GasCloudSurvivorDetectionRadius.Description: Radius in which survivors are affected by gas

GasCloudSimpleCollisionRadius.Description: Radius of the simple collider used for physics

GasCloudComplexCollisionRadius.Description: Radius of the complex collider used to detect overlaps when simple collision is missing

AntidoteCloudDuration.Description: This timer starts after the delayed activation

DissipateGasCloudTime.Description: Time a survivor must stay in contact with a gas cloud to dissipate it, in seconds

GasCloudMinimumLifetime.Description: Gas clouds won't start to dissipate until they're at least this old

HitByBombIndicatorDuration.Description: How long the beartrap-style indicator for a direct hit lasts, in seconds

EnableBottleCollisionWireframe.Description: 1 to enable bottle wireframe, 0 to disable

EnableGasCloudWireframe.Description: 1 to enable gas cloud wireframe, 0 to disable

GasCloudSpawnPointOffset.Description: Offset between the bottle collision point and the gas cloud spawn point, using the direction of the impact normal

BombCollisionRadius.Description: Radius of the sphere that detects collisions and causes the bomb to explode

BombDamageRadius.Description: Radius of sphere from center of explosion that will damage survivors. Set to 0 to disable bomb damage

GasCloudProjectilesToLaunch.Description: How many gas clouds are launched from one bomb

GasCloudEffectDuration.Description: How long does the gas cloud effect persist after the player exits the cloud

GasCloudEffectBaseMovementSpeedModifier.Description: Base movement speed modifier for survivors in the gas cloud

BombThrowWindupTime.Description: How long it takes to wind up

BombThrowReleaseTime.Description: How long it takes to release

ThrowerVelocityFactor.Description: How much of the thrower's velocity is added to the projectile from 0.0 to 1.0

BombThrowSecondsToCharge.Description: How long the clown must hold the bottle to get maximum throw velocity

BombThrowPitch.Description: CURVE Throw pitch is controlled by the BombThrowPitch curve

BombThrowSpeedWindup.Description: CURVE Movement speed while winding up is controlled by the BombThrowSpeedWindup curve

BombThrowSpeedHold.Description: CURVE Movement speed while holding the bomb is controlled by the BombThrowSpeedHold curve

BombThrowSpeedThrow.Description: CURVE Movement speed while throwing is controlled by the BombThrowSpeedThrow curve

BombThrowSpeedCooldown.Description: CURVE Movement speed during the cooldown is controlled by the BombThrowSpeedCooldown curve

ReloadBombsSpeed.Description: CURVE Movement speed while reloading is controlled by ReloadBombSpeed curve - WILL BE OVERRIDDEN BY ANIMATION WITH ROOT MOTION

EnablePlaceholderExplosion.Description: UNUSED 1 to enable placeholder explosion, 0 to disable it

PlaceholderSmokeDissipateDelay.Description: UNUSED How many seconds before the placeholder smoke begins to dissipate. It takes an additional 4 seconds or so to fully dissipate.

EnablePlaceholderSmoke.Description: UNUSED 1 to enable placeholder smoke, 0 to disable it

BombDirectHitBlindDuration.Description: UNUSED How long the survivor is blinded for on a direct hit from the projectile. Set to 0 for no blind.

ClownBottlePitchSpeedMin.Description: Rotation speed of the bottle in flight. I believe this is in degrees per second

GasCloudCosmeticFadeDuration.Description: Extra particle duration to make the visual better match the gas activation

AntidoteCloudCosmeticFadeDuration.Description: Extra particle duration to make the visual better match the gas activation
